item.travel_bag.travel_bag.desc: A travel bag for storing your items
item.travel_bag.travel_bag.open1: Right Click to open the bag
item.travel_bag.travel_bag.open2: Can only be opened if equiped in a slot from the mod Curio (with the related keybinds)
item.travel_bag.travel_bag.enchant: Right click on a grave's soul to increase the bag size
item.travel_bag.travel_bag.gluttony: Unlock the perk Gluttony to get a special slot
travel_bag.config.disable_enchanted_trav: Disable to enchant the travel bag
travel_bag.config.gluttony_speed.tooltip: Speed of extraction in ticks of the Gluttony slot
travel_bag.config.only_openable_from_cur: Bags can only be opened when in curio slots with the related keybind
travel_bag.config.enable_lootbag.tooltip: Bags can be found as loot filled with items
travel_bag.keybind.curios_bag_0: Open the bag in curios slot 0
travel_bag.keybind.curios_bag_1: Open the bag in curios slot 1
